clusters.label: Mixed Reviews on Fit and Quality
clusters.summary: Reviews show mixed experiences with clothing items, particularly dresses and tops. Customers appreciate the style and appearance of items but frequently encounter sizing issues, with many items running small or having inconsistent fit across different body types. Quality concerns include cheap-feeling materials, construction flaws, and sizing inconsistencies between regular and petite options.
strengths: Versatile pieces that can be dressed up or down
Good color options and attractive prints
weaknesses: Inconsistent sizing - many items run small
Quality issues with materials feeling cheap

clusters.label: Empty Reviews
clusters.summary: This cluster contains 95 reviews with no actual content - all entries are null/empty values, representing missing or unavailable review data.
weaknesses: Cannot provide meaningful insights from empty entries

personas.name: Quality-Conscious Shopper
goals: Get good value for money spent
pains: Difficulty determining fit from online descriptions
quotes: The sizing runs small, had to return
Good quality fabric but fit was off

pains: Don't have time to write detailed reviews
Overwhelmed by too many product options

pains: Fear of wasting money on poor quality
